ing: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut up
3 cups fresh or frozen broccoli flowerets
1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup (Regular or 98% Fat Free)
des: "This is our go-to recipe when we need good food that can be ready really fast. It features a scrumptious combination of chicken, broccoli, cream of chicken soup and cheese - and it's ready in 20 minutes."
ins:
Melt butter in skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned, stirring often.
Add broccoli, soup and milk. Cover and simmer 5 min. or until done. Sprinkle with cheese.
